sect2.title: ewl_button
sect2.para: The button widget is simply a widget with a label attached. When the user clicks on the button the callback attached to EWL_CALLBACK_CLICKED will be executed.

textobject.phrase: Example of an EWL entry box

example.title: Button Callback

sect2.para:
The label on a button can be manipulated after the button has been created through the two calls:
char *ewl_button_label_get(EwlButton *)
void ewl_button_label_set(EwlButton *, char *)
